title: Map an Array to an Object
description: In this lab, we will explore how to map an object array to an object using the provided mapping functions. We will use the Array.prototype.reduce() method to map the array, and the mapKey and mapValue functions to map the keys and values of the resulting object respectively. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to transform data structures in JavaScript.

meta.title: JavaScript | Object Mapping | Data Transformation
meta.description: Learn how to map an object array to an object using JavaScript's Array.prototype.reduce() method and custom mapping functions. Explore data transformation techniques.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, object mapping, data transformation, array to object, reduce, mapKey, mapValue

steps.title: Map an Array to an Object

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 将数组映射为对象
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何使用提供的映射函数将对象数组映射为一个对象。我们将使用 Array.prototype.reduce() 方法来映射数组，并分别使用 mapKey 和 mapValue 函数来映射结果对象的键和值。在本实验结束时，你将对如何在 JavaScript 中转换数据结构有更深入的理解。

meta.title: JavaScript | 对象映射 | 数据转换
meta.description: 学习如何使用 JavaScript 的 Array.prototype.reduce() 方法和自定义映射函数将对象数组映射为对象。探索数据转换技术。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 对象映射, 数据转换, 数组转对象, reduce, mapKey, mapValue

verify.name: 在 Zsh 历史记录中验证 Node 命令
